marketing_blurb: On Tuesday, April 21, 2020, I'll be speaking on "Reactive Spring" at the javaBin Online meetup and I hope to see you there!
I'll be speaking at the [London Java Community Meetup about Kotlin](https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/ljc-virtual-meetup-bootiful-kotlin-tickets-112484117022).
I'll be speaking at the upcoming SpringOne Tour event at the [_Reactive Spring_ event](https://springonetour.io/2020/reactive)
